revised_title: Ancient Gemstones and Engravings: A Study of Precious Stones
tldr: This article discusses the various types of gemstones, their origins, and how they were used for engraving by the ancients. It also explains the differences between Intaglio and Cameo engravings and the factors that determine the merit of these works. The author provides a table of precious stones and their characteristics, as well as a brief history of the use of gemstones in jewelry and art.
